about_the_game:
Embark on an artistic journey through time and space! From the heights of Montmartre in Paris to the golden wheat fields of Arles, from the tropical paradise of Tahiti to the majestic Mount Sainte-Victoire in Provence, the Magical Cat will guide you through an enchanted world of art.

🎨 Travel Through Artistic Time

  • Experience the brilliant golden hues of sunflowers and the swirling nebulae of starry nights

  • Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors of Tahitian paradise

  • Explore the geometric landscapes of Provence's rolling hills

  • Find artistic inspiration among blooming almond blossoms and cypress trees

✨ Unique Artistic Experience
Inspired by the Post-Impressionist masters, we reinterpret their iconic artistic language:

  • Van Gogh's emotional brushstrokes and swirling skies

  • Gauguin's pure tropical colors and primitive essence

  • Cézanne's geometric spatial structure and color composition

🌟 Innovative Perspective
This is not just an ordinary puzzle journey, but a feast of art and imagination. Each artwork is carefully crafted, infusing classical artistic language with a modern perspective to create a unique visual experience.

💫 Artistic Discovery
Following the Magical Cat's footsteps, you'll discover in puzzles:

  • The banks of the Rhône under the southern French sun

  • Twinkling night cafés

  • Primitive life in tropical paradise

  • Geometrically rendered natural landscapes

🎮 Game Features

  • Thoughtfully designed puzzle difficulty progression

  • Over 100 exciting puzzle artworks

  • Puzzle wallpaper unlocked after completion

  • Warm and healing atmosphere

  • Relaxing and enjoyable puzzle-solving experience

🎯 Perfect For

  • Puzzle enthusiasts: Enjoy puzzle-solving with unique visual styles

  • Art explorers: Experience modern interpretations of classic art

  • Casual gamers: Relax in an artistic atmosphere

Join the Magical Cat and immerse yourself in an ocean of art, where every puzzle piece becomes a gateway to discovering beauty!

📱 Gameplay Guide | Detailed Tutorial | Beginner's Tips

🎮 Essential Controls:
✨ Left-click to place puzzle pieces
✨ Right-click and drag to move the view
✨ Mouse wheel to zoom in/out

🎁 Special Features:
✨ Hint system available for every puzzle
✨ Complete puzzles to unlock HD wallpapers (auto-saves to desktop)
✨ Progress auto-saves for each puzzle

🌟 Extra Tips:
✨ Change background colors
✨ Reset camera view
✨ Shuffle pieces anytime

Tips: Take your time and enjoy the journey! Each puzzle is uniquely crafted for your entertainment! 🎨✨

movies.name: 概念宣传PV《艺术拼图的魔力》

name: Magic Puzzle King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 或 AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 或 AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

From the heights of Montmartre in Paris to the golden wheat fields of Arles, from the tropical paradise of Tahiti to the majestic Mount Sainte-Victoire in Provence, the Magical Cat will guide you through an enchanted world of art.
